name: Scratch

name: Python
description: General purpose programming language, popular in college-level intro programming courses. Easy to pick up yet very powerful.
officialDescription: Whether you're new to programming or an experienced developer, it's easy to learn and use Python.

name: Javascript
description: General purpose programming language, the language of the web - used to create websites
officialDescription: While it is most well-known as the scripting language for Web pages, Javascript is used for many other purposes.
